# rust dependency management
## cargo
### cargo.toml
add dependency like this:
```toml
[dependencies]
opendal = { path = "/Users/temp/Documents/incubator-opendal/core" } # local path
reqwest = { version = "0.11", features = ["json"] } # version
```
The reqwest crate is a HTTP client library for Rust. The json feature enables support for JSON serialization and deserialization.
The features section is optional. If it is not specified, then all of the features for the crate will be enabled.
### cargo.lock
```toml
# This file is automatically @generated by Cargo.
# It is not intended for manual editing.
```
